analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/16/0xa226aa0c9039808f72f3ef62205b7be58da12fef.sol:
	Contract Etheradium has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/16/0xa226aa0c9039808f72f3ef62205b7be58da12fef.sol#208)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/16/0xa226aa0c9039808f72f3ef62205b7be58da12fef.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/16/0xa226aa0c9039808f72f3ef62205b7be58da12fef.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/16/0xa226aa0c9039808f72f3ef62205b7be58da12fef.sol#78) is not in mixedCase
